trans-unit.source: Represents the metrics used to lay out a character in a device font.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics" /> class.
The <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> object is constructed using the default metric values.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> oggetto viene creato utilizzando i valori predefiniti delle metriche.

trans-unit.source: A comma-delimited <see cref="T:System.String" /> value that represents the metrics for the character.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics" /> class by specifying the metrics as a string.
The `metrics` parameter is a comma-delimited string that specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> properties in the following order:
trans-unit.target: Il `metrics` parametro è una stringa delimitata da virgole che specifica il <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> proprietà nell'ordine seguente:

trans-unit.source: The first two properties, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, are required.
trans-unit.target: Le prime due proprietà, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, sono necessari.

trans-unit.source: However, the other five properties are optional, and will default to zero if not specified.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, cinque proprietà sono facoltative e utilizzerà zero se non specificata.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify the string value of "0.75,0.75,,0.1" for the `metrics` parameter, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> properties are set—the unspecified properties are set to zero.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si specifica il valore di stringa di "0.75,0.75,,0.1" per il `metrics` parametro, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> sono impostate, mentre le proprietà vengono impostate su zero.

trans-unit.source: Gets the baseline value for the character.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Double" /> representing the baseline.
trans-unit.target: Un valore di tipo <see cref="T:System.Double" /> che rappresenta la linea di base.

trans-unit.source: The return value represents the vertical offset from the bottom of the black box to the baseline.
trans-unit.target: Il valore restituito rappresenta l'offset verticale dalla parte inferiore della casella di colore nero alla linea di base.

trans-unit.source: A positive value indicates the baseline is above the bottom of the black box, while a negative value indicates the baseline is below the bottom of the black box.
trans-unit.target: Un valore positivo indica che la linea di base è sopra la parte inferiore della casella nera, mentre un valore negativo indica che si trova sotto la parte inferiore della casella nera.

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the black box for the character.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Double" /> representing the black box height.
trans-unit.target: Un valore di tipo <see cref="T:System.Double" /> che rappresenta l'altezza della casella di colore nero.

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the black box for the character.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Double" /> representing the black box width.
trans-unit.target: Un valore di tipo <see cref="T:System.Double" /> che rappresenta la larghezza della casella di colore nero.

trans-unit.source: Gets the recommended white space below the black box.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore di tipo <see cref="T:System.Double" />.

trans-unit.source: A negative value indicates an overhang.
trans-unit.target: Un valore negativo indica una sporgenza.

trans-unit.source: The vertical advance for the character is the sum of the property values <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A>.
trans-unit.target: L'avanzamento verticale per il carattere è la somma dei valori di proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The vertical advance cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: L'avanzamento verticale non può essere minore di zero.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics" /> object to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics" /> object.
Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics" /> object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics" /> object.
<see langword="true" /> if the objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Two <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> objects are equal if the following properties are equal:
trans-unit.target: Due <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> gli oggetti sono uguali se le proprietà seguenti:

trans-unit.source: Creates a hash code from the metric values of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics" /> object.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Int32" />.
Gets the recommended white space to the left of the black box.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore di tipo <see cref="T:System.Double" />.

trans-unit.source: A negative value indicates an overhang.
trans-unit.target: Un valore negativo indica una sporgenza.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal advance for the character is
trans-unit.target: L'avanzamento orizzontale per il carattere è

trans-unit.source: the sum of the property values <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A>.
trans-unit.target: la somma dei valori di proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal advance cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: L'avanzamento orizzontale non può essere minore di zero.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a comma-delimited string representing metric values.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore di tipo <see cref="T:System.String" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> value is a comma-delimited string that specifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> properties in the following order:
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.String> valore è una stringa delimitata da virgole che specifica il <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics> proprietà nell'ordine seguente:

trans-unit.source: The first two properties, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, are required.
trans-unit.target: Le prime due proprietà, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, sono necessari.

trans-unit.source: However, the other five properties are optional, and will default to zero if not specified.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, cinque proprietà sono facoltative e utilizzerà zero se non specificata.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify the string value of "`0.75,0.75,,0.1`" for the `metrics` parameter, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> properties are set—the unspecified properties are set to zero.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si specifica il valore della stringa "`0.75,0.75,,0.1`" per il `metrics` parametro, il <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A> sono impostate, mentre le proprietà vengono impostate su zero.

trans-unit.source: Gets the recommended white space to the right of the black box.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore di tipo <see cref="T:System.Double" />.

trans-unit.source: A negative value indicates an overhang.
trans-unit.target: Un valore negativo indica una sporgenza.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal advance for the character is
trans-unit.target: L'avanzamento orizzontale per il carattere è

trans-unit.source: the sum of the property values <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A>.
trans-unit.target: la somma dei valori di proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.LeftSideBearing%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxWidth%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.RightSideBearing%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal advance cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: L'avanzamento orizzontale non può essere minore di zero.

trans-unit.source: Gets the recommended white space above the black box.
A value of type <see cref="T:System.Double" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore di tipo <see cref="T:System.Double" />.

trans-unit.source: Recommended white space above the black box.
trans-unit.target: Spazio vuoto consigliato sopra la casella nera.

trans-unit.source: The vertical advance for the character is the sum of the property values <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A>.
trans-unit.target: L'avanzamento verticale per il carattere è la somma dei valori di proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.TopSideBearing%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BlackBoxHeight%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Media.CharacterMetrics.BottomSideBearing%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The vertical advance cannot be less than zero.
trans-unit.target: L'avanzamento verticale non può essere minore di zero.
